English Content: Mina Design | Premium Furniture Sourcing Agency
Exquisite Turkish furniture sourcing for European markets. Bridging Anatolian craftsmanship with modern design excellence.
Direct B2B furniture sourcing from İnegöl, Turkey to Spain. Bridging European design with Turkish craftsmanship excellence.
"For us, furniture is not just a commodity; it is a heritage. Born and raised in İnegöl—the heart of Turkey’s furniture industry—we grew up in the workshops where sawdust turns into art."

We combine this innate understanding of craftsmanship with Industrial Engineering precision (UPV Alumni). We know which wood lasts a lifetime, which fabric withstands hotel traffic, and which joint will never creak. We don’t just source furniture; we guarantee 'Heirloom Quality'—pieces built to last for generations.
Direct access to İnegöl’s finest artisan workshops and high-tech factories.
Born in the furniture capital, perfected with Industrial Engineering.
Every stitch and joint is inspected before shipping. Zero defects.
We handle all import duties. Delivered directly to your door in Spain (DDP).
